title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' functionality does not always work. Specifically, when following the steps to close all editors and then selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: I expect that when I select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu after closing all editors, all saved files should be closed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 
2. Close all editors. 
3. Create a new file f1.txt. 
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
